function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and infection clusters in indoor settings","Mitigation":"Encouraging outdoor activities, promoting natural air movement, and supporting physical distancing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, outdoor activity facilities","People":"Individuals in indoor environments","Owner":"Local authorities, building managers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of outdoor opportunities for recreation","Impact":"Reduced access to green spaces can lead to limited outdoor activities and increased time spent indoors","Mitigation":"Developing and maintaining green spaces, providing recreational facilities, promoting outdoor activities","Technologies":"Park infrastructure, recreational facilities, urban planning","People":"Community members, urban planners, local authorities","Owner":"Local authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Suppression of social interaction","Impact":"Suppression of social interaction can lead to sustained mental health challenges and potential increase in indoor gatherings","Mitigation":"Promoting outdoor social settings, organizing outdoor events, providing incentives for outdoor interactions","Technologies":"Outdoor event spaces, public gathering areas, social engagement platforms","People":"Those affected by social interaction suppression","Owner":"Community organizations, mental health advocates, public health organizations"}]}
